abstract: In purchasing Cogent, 3M hoped to tap into a $4 billion global biometric market that it said was projected to grow more than 20 percent annually.
snippet: In purchasing Cogent, 3M hoped to tap into a $4 billion global biometric market that it said was projected to grow more than 20 percent annually.
lead_paragraph: The 3M Company agreed to buy Cogent, a manufacturer of fingerprint identification systems for governments and companies, for $943 million to expand its security services products.

headline.main: 3M Will Buy Cogent, Maker of Fingerprint ID Systems
headline.print_headline: 3M Will Buy Cogent, Maker Of Fingerprint ID Systems
